fpmExplorer:Page.title: Custom Filters
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The filter bar displays the most suitable selection control for each field, based on the data type. You can customize the filter bar by using a different selection control if it better suits your use case.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Define Custom Filter Fields
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Define custom filter bars as FilterField controls inside FilterBar. The Key property points to the property from the service.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Define Custom Filter Bar via Manifest
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Alternatively, define a custom filter bar using the manifest configuration.
